hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -eux virtualenv ENV set +o nounset . ENV/bin/activate set -o nounset
#cd $WORKSPACE/oss-fuzz/infra/gcb #pip install -r requirements.txt #cd $WORKSPACE/oss-fuzz
cd oss-fuzz ls
#python infra/center.py build_image ${JOB_NAME#*/} python infra/center.py build_fuzzers -d --engine aflgo ${JOB_NAME#*/} echo core >/proc/sys/kernel/core_pattern python infra/center.py run_fuzzer ${JOB_NAME#*/} ${JOB_NAME#*/} #build_id=$(python build_project.py $WORKSPACE/oss-fuzz/$JOB_NAME) #python wait_for_build.py $build_id
cp -r build/out/upx /home/liqiang/oss-fuzz/build/out/ cp -r build/work/upx /home/liqiang/oss-fuzz/build/work/
